nodes.text: The Port Haileap library was a library in the spaceport outpost of Port Haileap, located on the planet Haileap in the Dalnan sector. Used by the Jedi stationed at the port, the library contained archives about Force users with fewer rules than the Jedi Order, such as the Nightsisters and the Guardians of Javin. While stationed at Port Haileap with his master, Padawan Imri Cantaros studied in the library.
